description.p:
This addon implements the opened platform called Open Toutatice (which one is based on the Nuxeo DM distribution)
Main evolutions:
* webpage : new fragments : picture, summary * webpage : a fragment can collapse * webpage : a portalpage or portalsite has now an editorial title, thumbnail are not resized yet * a widget to browse and select a picture or a document by its webId * Possibility to create a PortalSite with template
Main fixes provided: * fixes #739: Permission 'valider' à ajouter sur un document de type PortalPage
